title: Develop AKS Terraform Module
description: Create reusable Terraform module for AKS including node pools, CNI networking, and identity integration.

title: Implement Cluster Security & RBAC
description: Configure Azure AD integration for cluster access and setup Network Security Groups (NSGs).

title: Provision PostgreSQL with PostGIS & PITR
description: Terraform module for PostgreSQL Flexible Server with PostGIS extension, PITR enabled, and high availability.

title: Configure Geo-Redundant Blob Storage
description: Provision Azure Storage Account with GRS replication and private endpoints.

title: Define B2C Custom Policy XML (Base)
description: Create TrustFrameworkBase.xml defining claims, transformations, and technical profiles.

title: Implement MFA & Role Claims in Policy
description: Extend policy to enforce MFA for Admin roles and inject Role claims into JWT.

title: Design Product Entity & TypeORM Schema
description: Define Product entity with SoftDelete, Relations to User/Brand, and migration scripts.

title: Implement Product CRUD & Soft Delete Logic
description: Implement service methods for Create, Read, Update, Delete. Override delete to perform soft delete.

title: Define WatermelonDB Schema & Migration
description: Setup WatermelonDB, define tables (ServiceRequest, Product, User), and create initial migration.

title: Implement Service Request Entity & State Machine
description: Define entity with enum-based status. Implement transitions logic.

title: Implement Geospatial Routing Service
description: Create service to query PostGIS for Service Centers where User location ST_Intersects Service Area.

title: Setup .NET SignalR Project & Redis Backplane
description: Initialize ASP.NET Core project, configure SignalR, and set up Redis backplane.

title: Implement Sync Pull Protocol
description: Implement the 'Pull' logic to fetch changes from backend since last sync timestamp.

title: Implement Sync Push & Queueing
description: Implement 'Push' logic to send local changes to backend. Handle offline queueing.

title: Setup Mapbox GL JS in Next.js
description: Integrate Mapbox GL JS with Next.js, configure API keys, and basic map rendering.

title: Implement Polygon Drawing Tools
description: Add drawing controls using mapbox-gl-draw.

title: Configure HPA and Metrics Server
description: Implement Horizontal Pod Autoscaler settings and ensure Metrics Server is functioning.

title: Integrate Routing with Service Request Creation
description: Wire routing service into creation flow. Assign SC and trigger Event Bus message.

title: Implement Location Ingestion & Broadcast Logic
description: Implement Hub methods to receive GPS stream from Technician and broadcast to specific User group.

title: Implement TimescaleDB Storage for History
description: Persist incoming location points to TimescaleDB asynchronously.

title: Implement Background Location Module
description: Setup native modules for iOS and Android for background GPS.

title: Integrate SignalR Client for Location Streaming
description: Connect to backend SignalR hub. Stream location updates from native module to hub.

title: Travel Mode UI & Testing
description: Implement UI toggle for Travel Mode and status indicators.

title: Implement GeoJSON Validation & Export
description: Validate drawn polygons. Export to GeoJSON and submit to API.

title: Validate Auth Flows & Integration Test
description: Create automated tests for login flows including MFA scenarios.

title: Implement Field Locking Business Rule
description: Implement interceptor to check if Service Request exists before allowing update.

title: Load Testing & Optimization
description: Perform load testing with 10k concurrent connections to verify P95 latency.

title: Develop Disaster Recovery Drill Script
description: Create a script to simulate region failover and verify RPO/RTO metrics.
